miniapp.name: Patch
miniapp.subtitle: Weave a tiny daily tile
miniapp.description: Patch is a tiny weaving mini app where you tap a 6x6 grid to stitch a simple textile tile. Cycle stitches per cell and keep a different woven patch for each day.
miniapp.ogDescription: Patch is a tiny weaving mini app where you tap a 6x6 grid to stitch a simple textile tile. Cycle stitches per cell and keep a different woven patch for each day.
